## IAuthenticator interface

Represents an authenticator that can authenticate requests to the ChainPro backend and Turnkey's services.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IAuthenticator extends ITurnkeyStamper 
```
**Extends:** ITurnkeyStamper
